title: How to Start and Scale a Dropshipping Business on Amazon
headline: Learn how to set up and run a dropshipping business on Amazon in this free online eCommerce course for entrepreneurs.
description: If you want to start a business from home, dropshipping might be the perfect fit for you. This eCommerce course teaches aspiring entrepreneurs how to start a dropshipping business from scratch. We show you how to find the right products to dropship on Amazon before examining useful software applications that simplify the process and save you valuable time and energy. Learn how to improve your performance, deal with customers and maximise profits.

courseDescription:
Dropshipping is an eCommerce business model that allows individuals and businesses to sell products sourced from a third party without having to maintain a physical inventory. In this course, we explain how to dropship on Amazon. We show you how to find the right products to dropship on Amazon and set their optimum prices. Product prices are liable to change at any moment due to market trends and customer demands. This makes it difficult and time-consuming to manually update the prices of items immediately after price fluctuations. We teach you how to automatically update the prices of your listed items using the right software applications to maintain competitive prices at all times. We examine the Amazon ‘Buy Box’ and establish its importance before discussing how you can earn and profit from it to beat the competition.

Your shipping performance on Amazon is measured by certain key parameters that include order fulfilment and late shipping rate. We emphasise the importance of maintaining good shipping performance and fulfilling the shipping requirements set by Amazon to improve your rank and move ahead of the pack. Keeping your customers satisfied is one of the biggest challenges of any business. You will inevitably come across dissatisfied customers who want to return their items. We show you how to create a customised return policy and professionally handle customer complaints and returns. Keeping track of your business performance is important to identify areas of improvement and make the changes necessary to increase sales. We explain how to maintain an auto-calculating spreadsheet to record your business revenue, expenses and profits to analyse your business performance. The course then demonstrates how to use your business expenses to reduce your taxable income and increase your profit margins.

We designed this course for people who want to build a dropshipping business on Amazon. This course is also useful for eCommerce professionals who are already working as dropshippers and want to improve their knowledge and expertise. The dropshipping techniques provided in this course are simple and easy to follow. Dropshipping does not require you to ship products to your customers as it is done by the actual supplier. As a dropshipper, you don’t need to leave your house to run the business and generate passive income. Since online shopping trends have increased significantly during the Covid pandemic, the prospects of growth in the dropshipping business are higher than ever before. Sign up for this eCommerce course to acquire dropshipping skills and turn your entrepreneurial spirit into profit.

Start Course Now

All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will teach you how to build and expand your Amazon dropshipping business. We'll show you how to find the right products, set prices and automate pricing and inventory levels for constant sales. You'll learn how to improve your seller rank on Amazon, deal with common issues as a dropshipper and maximize profits by paying fewer taxes.
topics: Becoming a Successful Dropshipper - Learning Outcomes
Becoming a Successful Dropshipper - Lesson Summary

• Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • Discuss the working and basics of dropshipping business on Amazon.
    • Identify the right products to dropship on Amazon.
    • Select suitable software programs to automate pricing and online inventory.
    • Compare prices of different items on Amazon with other online retailers.
    • Explain different strategies for increasing sales as an Amazon dropshipper.
    • Solve common Amazon dropshipping problems.
    • Indicate tools that are required to improve your seller performance.
    • Estimate taxes based on your dropshipping income.
    • Recognize common reasons for account suspension and suitable remedies.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The main points from this module are:
    • Dropshipping is facilitating sales from your supplier, whether retailers or wholesalers.
    • A dropshipper doesn’t have to produce items for sale or maintain an inventory of goods.
    • Dropshipping on Amazon requires you to list Amazon products on your website and compete with other sellers.
    • There are many useful software applications to automate your dropshipping business to save time and energy.
    • You need to perform extensive product research on Amazon to select the right products to dropship.
    • Sku Grid can automate the prices of products and manage inventory levels for you according to the changes made by suppliers.
    • Buy Box is the ‘add to cart’ and ‘buy now’ buttons on Amazon to help customers make quick purchases.
    • Third-party sellers compete to win the Buy Box which largely depends on product price and shipping rate.
    • Your shipping performance on Amazon is measured by three main seller metrics: late shipment rate, pre-fulfillment cancel rate and valid tracking rate.
    • You can write off your business expenses in the income statement to decrease taxes and maximize profits.
    • Seller accounts can get suspended for poor seller performance and failing to meet the rates set by Amazon.
